com.ecomDomain.reuseMethods

Class Wishlist_Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ecomDomain.reuseMethods.Wishlist_Util

  • public class Wishlist_Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Re-Usable methods of Wishlist Functionality for Retail Sites Also created re-usable methods for DemandWare business flows Some of the DW methods can be optimized and use for other platform based retail site also
    Author:
    harish.subramani

      • removeFromWishlist

        public static final void removeFromWishlist(java.lang.String btnRemvWishilst,
                                            java.lang.String wishlistPosition,
                                            org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
        Remove Wishlist Button - DW and Non-DW Sites
        Parameters:
        btnRemvWishilst - : Wishlist Delete String [CSS Selector]
        wishlistPosition - : $ symbol in btnRemvWishilst param will be replaced with this string. Ex: "1" - ul[class=''] li:nth-child(1) a
        driver - : WebDriver Instance
